content: {"Name": "The Anchor Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 99, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "The Anchor", "More_Information": "Serves the town of Schodack and Village of Castleton\r\nCalling ahead appreciated but walk ins welcome.\r\nThrift store opened for shopping; same hrs. as operation", "Counties": ["Rensselaer"], "Location": "Castleton", "Address": "35 Boltwood Avenue", "City": "Castleton-On-Hudson", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12033", "Phone": "(518) 732-4120", "Hours_of_Operation": "Monday 4:30pm-6:30pm, Tues 9am-1:00 pm, Thurs 9am-1:30 pm & 1st Sat of month  10am-12:30pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.facebook.com/pg/The-Anchor-Food-Pantry-912784275466563/about/", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.536922", "Longitude": "-73.749422", "Last_Updated": "06-12-2025", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
